The [`produce_site_qrcode`](https://oggioniale.github.io/ReLTER/reference/produce_site_qrcode.html) function allows to create QRCode of activity, dataset, sensor and site by DEIMS.iD.

```{r qrcode, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
qrcode <- ReLTER::produce_site_qrcode(
  deimsid = "https://deims.org/f30007c4-8a6e-4f11-ab87-569db54638fe"
)
plot(qrcode)
```
